features: Design for Baby: the mini fan with a flexible tripod/Legs, versatile and easy to clip on most strollers, crib, wheelchair, carriage and etc in any position, it’s a lifesaver for car seat, especially those with rear facing, your kid and you can enjoy cool and comfortable ride

360 Degree Angled and 3 Speeds: the stroller fan's head can adjust vertically and horizontally for any direction,to create the perfect cooling breeze; it comes with 3 speeds for different purpose, powerful wind yet whisper working

Rechargeable and Portable: comes with 2600mah battery, lasts 2.5-10 hours depending on winds, support USB charging via power bank laptop and any power source with USB output,a must have for you and your kids trip to Disneyland, zoo and park

Baby-Friendly: fan cover specifically designed to protect little inquisitive fingers; this fan with LED lights of 3 setting, light up the night, keep your baby feeling safe, convenient for Mom and the elder in the darkness

Durable and Sturdy: our engineer designed the tripod with flexible knobs, the legs strong enough to be bent over and over; to present you a cool and worry-free summer, we offer 12 month Replacement Warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for strollers!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for when I was in the hospital during my labor and delivery. So nice to have some airflow! I run hot so this was helpful. Now I use it for my baby in her stroller in the summer. But it’s handy to have anywhere. Easy to use and adjustable. The charge lasts for awhile, I never time it to be honest but at least an hour, maybe more? Either way it charges quick. Uses a basic usb plug. It’s not very loud at all, but I found the fan sound relaxing personally either way. I recommend. Great as a gift in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fan is great I live where it is very hot and the speeds of the fan is amazing. The LED light is just a bonus! I bought for my babies car seat and the light will come in handy when it’s darker and I have to do something quickly. Not to mention the flexibility of it and how many positions you can turn and tilt it in. Definitely worth the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this!
reviews.reviewText: This was so much help in the summer! Strong for such a little fan but a very good one. The light really helped when walking in the house ant night. Had 3 fan modes and 3 lights modes. Only issue is it doesn’t let you know when it’s about to die. Just cuts off on its own. It will run while charging. Very easy to put on anything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little fan
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my peloton and it works great. I wrap it around the handle bar and it makes such a huge difference in my work outs. It's surprisingly strong - I personally wouldn't want it to be any stronger. I have found that I can work out harder when I'm staying cooler with a fan like this. It also has a light on it - I don't have any use for that but I could see it being helpful in some situations. I usually workout for 20-30 minutes and this fan can usually do 3-5 workouts before needing to be recharged. Maybe more - I just don't want to risk it dying on me while I'm working out. I just take it off to charge it and it's so easy to take off/put back on that it's not big deal. I definitely prefer this to one that plugs into the peloton - I just have concerns about plugging external devices into the peloton. So this one is perfect that it's battery operated!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect little fan. Battery doesn’t seem to last a while after a charge but still great product. Has two fan settings which I love. Used during my labor process and will continue to use on my stroller for hot summer days! Super sturdy once attached to something. Not a loud fan and perfect size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great concept - Battery is not the best
reviews.reviewText: Okay so this is a great concept. I love the color and style, but I do feel like sometimes the battery drains fast. I did have to get a new fan because mine stopped working after a week or so, but the seller sent me another right away! Customer service was great. It is very easy to set up anywhere you need it and grips well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing!! LONG battery life too but don’t forget to plug it in at night if you plan on using it the next day. We used it on vacation in FL and it was a necessity everyday. Very powerful though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST Stroller Fan
reviews.reviewText: We've taken this fan all over the world and on several trips to Disney Parks, and it's holding up great. We love that it can easily attach to nearly any handlebar (perfect for the stroller) or that it can stand in a tripod position. Not only is it great for keeping my daughter cool, I use it too! I pack it in one of the exterior drink pockets on my carry-on bag and whip it out during boarding time on planes when the AC isn't running fully yet. I've used it in the UK as a table-side fan when our accommodation didn't have AC. I've also used it on a cruise when our AC quit working the first night. It's fantastic all around! I recommend it to all of my friends who have kids.

We went to the DR on vacation with our 2 year old and I swear we couldn’t live without this fan. We had it on constantly throughout the day and night and it was perfect at keeping our toddler cool. It fits onto both our strollers (UppaBaby and Summer Infant) perfectly. The little legs are adjustable so you can wrap it around any bar on the stroller and position it as you’d like. There are 3 different speeds on the fan, as well as a light. It comes with a charging cable as it’s not battery operated but I found the charge lasted a very long time.I’m very happy with this purchase and it was worth every penny. A must have in the summers and when traveling to warm destinations!
Todo esta perfecto menos que la carga no le dura mucho. Aún así lo recomiendo y recomiendo lo carguen despues De cada uso

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to fan myself when sunbathing…And wow, it’s exceeded my expectations, there are two buttons on the back, one for the fan speed, and one for the led lights, so easy to use.The three speeds are great, from light gentle breeze, to quite powerful, so it cools you down quite quickly, also helping breath in humidity!The three arms can be wrapped around almost anything, and it is sturdy enough to stay in whatever position you want it, you can also adjust the fan head up or down, which I figured out after many uses!🙄I attach it to my deck chair arm, where it stays without any problems, It can also just stand up on many surfaces, they don’t have to be flat, due to the noodle arms!A fantastic fan, that friends and family have also bought after seeing mine.

La batería dura bastante. Tiene tres velocidades y además tiene luz con tres intensidades lo cual resulta muy útil. Yo lo llevo en el carrito del bebé para que mueva un poco el aire y por ahora cumple su función 100%.

Très bon ventilateur de poussette! Je l'ai acheté en priorité pour la poussette de mes deux chats persans pour partir en vacances, mais je m'en sers aussi sur mon caddy de courses! Il ventile très bien (trois niveaux de vitesse) et la charge dure longtemps (environ huit heure d'affilée). Il ne fait aucun bruit. On me demande souvent si c'est bien et où je l'ai acheté. Je ne regrette pas mon achat.
